sourcesContent:
import { Component, HostListener, OnInit } from '@angular/core'; @Component({ selector: 'app-home', templateUrl: './home.component.html', styleUrls: ['./home.component.css'], }) export class HomeComponent { @HostListener('window:scroll', []) onWindowScroll() { const sections = document.querySelectorAll('.section'); sections.forEach((section) => { const sectionTop = section.getBoundingClientRect().top; const windowHeight = window.innerHeight; // If the section is in view, add the 'visible' class if (sectionTop < windowHeight - 100) { section.classList.add('visible'); } }); } }

We are build wise

build wise company

We are committed not only to providing high-quality products and services, but also to going above and beyond to ensure complete customer satisfaction.

let's know about

our services

Discover our commitment to excellence in construction services, from high-quality materials supply to specialized engineering solutions.

supply of construction materials

We provide top-quality construction materials to support your projects, ensuring durability, safety, and long-term value for your building needs.

engineering services

Offering expert engineering solutions tailored to your specific project requirements, from initial design to completion, ensuring excellence in execution.

Specialized Construction

Combining innovation and expertise, we deliver specialized construction services, including post-tensioning, elastomeric bearing, and expansion joints, for optimal structural performance.
